one_reviews_text: We thought it was an interactive game. But it is really a very short 3D movie/video. It should say in the description that it is not a game.

I found this experience quite pleasant, but it’s also short and ends right as things start to get good. It reminds me a lot of the demos that used to be popular back in the DK2 days. Still, it’s nice to see more anime-styled VR getting released. Wouldn’t mind a second chapter :)
